amendment.description: To require a report on technologies designed to neutralize or defeat the threat to military rotary wing aircraft posed by portable air defense systems and rocket propelled grenades.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4354 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4354 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6120) To require a report on technologies designed to neutralize or defeat the threat to military rotary wing aircraft posed by portable air defense systems and rocket propelled grenades.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4354 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4354 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
